specialCheckInInstructions: Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.
requiredAtCheckIn: Credit card, debit card, or cash deposit required for incidental charges
Government-issued photo ID may be required

healthAndSafetyMeasures.title: Enhanced health and safety measures
healthAndSafetyMeasures.description: This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place.
measures: Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures
Property uses a professional cleaning service

alternativeNames: 31 Street Broadway Hotel Aparthotel New York
mandatoryFees:
• A tax is imposed by the city: USD 3.5 per accommodation, per night
  • 12 percent destination fee will be charged
optionalExtras:
Early check-in can be arranged for an extra charge of USD 60 (subject to availability)

Late check-out can be arranged for an extra charge of USD 50 (subject to availability)
Pets are allowed for an extra charge of USD 40 per pet, per stay

WiFi is available in guestrooms for USD 5 per day (rates may vary)

WiFi is available in public areas for USD 5 per day (rates may vary)
policies:
Guests can rest easy knowing there's a smoke detector on site.

This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place.

The property is professionally cleaned; disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F.

additionalInfo.description:
1 Double Bed

97 sq feet


Internet - WiFi

Entertainment - Flat-screen TV with cable channels

Food & Drink - Kitchenette with refrigerator and microwave

Bathroom - Shared bathroom, in-room sink, free toiletries, and towels

Practical - Washer/dryer

Comfort - Air conditioning

Need to Know - Limited housekeeping, toothbrush and toothpaste not available

Non-Smoking, pet friendly
